main event: Two youths observed a bright light that was possibly reflected moonlight in Blauvelt, New York, on July 13, 1965.
interesting points: The observation lasted for approximately one hour between 4 and 5 AM., There was fog present in the area at the time of the sighting., The object changed brightness and seemed to fade away around 5 AM., The object was described as a bright white light that made a slight buzzing sound., The youths were aged 11 and 13 and did not provide photographs or physical evidence.
sighted object: a bright light possibly reflected moonlight
